title: Timestampable Trait Parameters
description: Configuration contract for the Timestampable trait's audit timeline settings.

recordedEvents.description: Canonical lifecycle events captured when tracking timestamp provenance.

items.description: Lifecycle event identifier such as created, updated, or archived.

timezone.description: Default timezone context applied when presenting timestamps.

allowNullUpdatedAt.description: When true, updated_at may be omitted until a mutation occurs.
